    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Entry point for the server application.
      Parameters:
      args - optional command-line arguments for server configuration.

    • handleAccept

      public static void handleAccept(Selector selector, SelectionKey key) throws IOException
      Handles accepting new client connections.
      Parameters:
      selector - the Selector managing all channel registrations.
      key - the SelectionKey representing the current accept event.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during client connection.

    • handleRead

      static void handleRead(SelectionKey key) throws IOException
      Handles reading client data and executing corresponding commands.
      Parameters:
      key - the SelectionKey representing the current read event.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading data.

    • disconnectClient

      static void disconnectClient(SocketChannel clientChannel, SelectionKey key) throws IOException
      Disconnects a client safely, cleaning up resources and notifying other components.
      Parameters:
      clientChannel - the channel of the client to disconnect.
      key - the selection key of the client to clean up.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.
